title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 148.6 - Appeal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 148.6 - Appeal

State Regulations

Where a petition for relief from firearms
disabilities is denied, the petitioner shall have the right to appeal the
determination to a court for a de novo review of the denial of the petition
under article 78 of the Civil Practice Law and Rules. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
148.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
